AI Description: Py-htseq is a high-throughput sequencing (HTS) analysis tool in Python designed to process and analyze mapped sequence data, particularly for RNA-seq experiments. It facilitates gene expression analysis by counting reads that align to features in the reference genome or transcriptome.
Core Features: Processing Mapped Sequence Data, Gene Expression Analysis, Counting Reads Aligned To Features In Reference Genome/Transcriptome
General Tags: Hts Analysis, RNA-Seq, Sequence Data Processing, Gene Expression, Transcriptomics
